subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: With the top contenders saving themselves for the monstrous test in the Pyrenees on Thursday, Cyril Dessel of France and Juan Miguel Mercado of Spain dueled for the stage victory after riding for 56 miles at the front.
snippet: With the top contenders saving themselves for the monstrous test in the Pyrenees on Thursday, Cyril Dessel of France and Juan Miguel Mercado of Spain dueled for the stage victory after riding for 56 miles at the front.
